title: Kenji Mizoguchi The Life of a Film Director - 1975 - Kaneto Shin
description:
JAPANESE FILMDIRECTOR Kenji Mizoguchi 

This documentary is quite lengthy (2,5 hours) and 
sprinkled with details (miscellaneous information) 
about Kenji Mizoguchi - very personal things, his 
way of working on set and various impressions of 
his work. Most of it is interviews with all sorts 
of people (coworkers from film sets, production 
company managers, ...) 
But if you havn&#039;t yet seen any of his films or havn&#039;t 
been infected with passionate desire for Mizoguchi&#039;s 
unique stile this may a bit too long for you and seem 
boring. 

Languages: Japanese soundtrack, English hard subtitles 

Video duration: 2:29:45 
Video specs: Xvid, 720x480, 23.98fps 
Audio specs: MP3, 44.1 KHz, 192Kbps, stereo


To see two of Mizoguchi&#039;s GEISHA films go to  <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4071234/Geisha_Stories_(Kenji_Mizoguchi___BBC)_Japanese_with_English_sub" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4071234/Geisha_Stories_(Kenji_Mizoguchi___BBC)_Japanese_with_English_sub</a>
